meanings.definition: Coming after the eighth in a series.
meanings.sent1: She was excited to attend her ninth birthday party.
meanings.sent2: The ninth book in the series was the most thrilling.
meanings.sent3: He felt like a superhero on his ninth attempt to jump over the puddle.
meanings.sent4: The ninth inning of the game was filled with tension and excitement.
meanings.sent5: The ninth place ribbon made her feel proud of her efforts.

meanings.sent1: She ate a ninth of the pizza all by herself.
meanings.sent2: The cake was divided into ninths for each guest.
meanings.sent3: He always saved the ninth cookie for last as a special treat.
meanings.sent4: The ninth of the pie disappeared quickly at the family gathering.
meanings.sent5: The treasure map led to the ninth piece of the puzzle hidden under the tree.

meanings.definition: The interval between one note and another note eight notes away from it.
meanings.sent1: The musician played the ninth on the piano with skill.
meanings.sent2: In the choir, she sang the ninth beautifully.
meanings.sent3: The cat's meow sounded like a high-pitched ninth in the melody.
meanings.sent4: The bird's chirp added a sweet ninth to the symphony of sounds.
meanings.sent5: The ninth note in the song brought a sense of completion to the melody.
